trait.name: Mental Resistance
entries: The broodguard has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't paralyze it.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the broodguard can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The broodguard makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

variant.name: Chameleon Skin
entries: The yuan-ti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

variant.name: Shed Skin (1/Day)
entries: The yuan-ti can shed its skin as a bonus action to free itself from a grapple, shackles, or other restraints. If the yuan-ti spends 1 minute eating its shed skin, it regains hit points equal to half its hit point maximum.
